definitions.definition: The image-making power of the mind ; the act of mentally creating or reproducing an object not previously perceived; the ability to create such images.
examples: Imagination is one of the most advanced human faculties.

definitions.definition: Particularly, construction of false images; fantasizing.
examples: You think someone's been following you? That's just your imagination .
His imagination makes him a valuable team member.

definitions.definition: A mental image formed by the action of the imagination as a faculty; something imagined .

main_definition: The image-making power of the mind ; the act of mentally creating or reproducing an object not previously perceived; the ability to create such images.
secondary_definitions: Particularly, construction of false images; fantasizing.
A mental image formed by the action of the imagination as a faculty; something imagined .
